actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunications and Finance.

official_title: A bill to require the Federal Communications Commission to prescribe standards for compatibility of mobile radio systems for public safety uses, and for other purposes.
short_title: Public Safety Radio Compatibility Act of 1988

summary.text: Public Safety Radio Compatibility Act of 1988 - Directs the Federal Communications Commission, as part of its national public safety plan for mobile radio communications, to prescribe regulations setting national technical standards to establish interoperability between and among trunked public safety radio systems.

titles.title: Public Safety Radio Compatibility Act of 1988
A bill to require the Federal Communications Commission to prescribe standards for compatibility of mobile radio systems for public safety uses, and for other purposes.
